MixTankÂ¶

class biosteam.units.MixTank(ID='', ins=None, outs=(), thermo=None, *, vessel_type='Conventional', tau=1, V_wf=0.8, vessel_material='Stainless steel', kW_per_m3=0.0985)[source]Â¶

Create a mixing tank with volume based on residence time.

Parameters

  • ins (streams) â Inlet fluids to be mixed.

  • outs (stream) â Outlet.

  • vessel_type (str) â Vessel type.

  • tau=1 (float) â Residence time [hr].

  • V_wf=0.8 (float) â Fraction of working volume over total volume.

  • vessel_material (str, optional) â Vessel material. Defaults to âStainless steelâ.

  • kW_per_m3=0.0985 (float) â Electricity requirement per unit volume [kW/m^3].

Notes

For a detailed discussion on the design and cost algorithm, please read the Tank documentation.

The purchase cost algorithm is based on 1.

References

1

Apostolakou, A. A., Kookos, I. K., Marazioti, C., Angelopoulos, K. C. (2009). Techno-economic analysis of a biodiesel production process from vegetable oils. Fuel Processing Technology, 90(7â8), 1023â1031. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.fuproc.2009.04.017
